ygData.subject: RE: [shadowknight] Grobb Cleaver or bust?
ygData.msgSnippet: I recommend a Mith 2h sword.   I don t have one (I have a reaver) but the Haste effect I heard about was good. ... From: (Lasombra Shadowfiend)
ygData.messageBody:
RE: [shadowknight] Grobb Cleaver or bust?

I recommend a Mith 2h sword.   I don't have one (I have a reaver) but the Haste effect I heard about was good.


-----Original Message-----
From: (Lasombra Shadowfiend) [mailto:vtemplarv@...]
Sent: Friday, March 03, 2000 1:30 PM
To: shadowknight@onelist.com
Subject: [shadowknight] Grobb Cleaver or bust?


From: "(Lasombra Shadowfiend)" <vtemplarv@...>

Ok, as promissed here are more questions directed at DE, Human, Erdite
(sounds wierd eh?) SKs out there.
I had a Grobb Cleaver with my TSK and am curious what 2HS you all use. I
plan on keeping both 1HS and 2HS maxxed as long as possible.
So what is a good 2HS obtainable at around 26th level. What should one
expect to pay for it?
I am thinking of getting another Cleaver, I liked it and did well with it.


--
Lasombra
